title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Analyzing Challenges and Preparedness in Emergency Distance Education (EDE)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major issues and countermeasures of Emergency Remote Education (ERE)

Within a week, learners propose a 10–12-slide PPT solution for accessibility issues of learners aged 40+ in public/nonprofit institutions: (1) selecting one screen-magnification/voice-conversion strategy and (2) including three guidelines for supplementary materials (e.g., ≥14pt font, high-contrast colors, audio descriptions). The proposal must achieve ≥4/5 on the evaluation rubric.
Learners can create a practical readiness checklist for effective ERE operation in blended environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
